title: Top Places to visit in Virudhunagar, Tamil Nadu
content: Virudhunagar (also known as Virudupatti) is a town and the administrative headquarters of the Virudhunagar district in the South Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is located 506 km (314 mi) southwest of the state capital Chennai and 53 km (33 mi) south of Madurai. Virudhunagar emerged as an importan
